data.name: Captain Britain
data.description: With mystical abilities granted to him by Merlin, Brian Braddock channels his self-confidence and multiversal energy to protect the British Isles and his allies.

starItems.name: Captain Britain
starItems.description: With mystical abilities granted to him by Merlin, Brian Braddock channels his self-confidence and multiversal energy to protect the British Isles and his allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
If primary target does not have Barrier, this attack does +<color=#86e619>50%</color> additional damage

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. If primary target does not have Barrier, attack for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage, instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on the primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. If primary target does not have Barrier, attack for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage, instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. If primary target does not have Barrier, attack for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage, instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. If primary target does not have Barrier, attack for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage, instead.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> additional damage if primary target does not have Barrier

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. If primary target does not have Barrier, attack for <color=#86e619>390%</color> damage, instead.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. If primary target does not have Barrier, attack for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage, instead.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
7.nextUpgrade: Clear all positive effects on primary target

item.name: Captain Britain's Basic Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + clear all positive effects. If primary target does not have Barrier, attack for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage, instead.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and each secondary target. This action gains +<color=#86e619>1,500%</color> Extra Focus.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
If this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to all <color=#fff568>HERO SUPPORT</color> allies

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
If this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to all <color=#fff568>HERO SUPPORT</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and each secondary target. This action gains +<color=#86e619>1,500%</color> Extra Focus.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
If the primary target does not have Barrier, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

If the primary target does not have Barrier, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

If this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to all <color=#fff568>HERO SUPPORT</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and each secondary target. This action gains +<color=#86e619>1,500%</color> Extra Focus.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to each target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

 If the primary target does not have Barrier, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and each secondary target. This action gains +<color=#86e619>1,500%</color> Extra Focus.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target

7.description:

If the primary target does not have Barrier, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and each secondary target. This action gains +<color=#86e619>1,500%</color> Extra Focus.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.

8.description:

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from primary and each secondary target. This action gains +<color=#86e619>1,500%</color> Extra Focus.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > On <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color>, instead, attack the <color=#fff568>BIO BRAWLER</color> with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

2.description:

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

item.name: Captain Britain's Ultimate Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn, and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Clear all negative effects on this character.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>:
 > On <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color>, instead, attack the <color=#fff568>BIO BRAWLER</color> with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

On Turn, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to each target.

When this character or an <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
 > Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health, flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on self to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, lower the Crit Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

The Speed of this character and each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, Speed Bar cannot be filled or reduced by any character for themselves, allies, or enemies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means).
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor for self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

On Turn, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to each target.

When this character or an <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > If this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
 > Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health, flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> on self to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, lower the Crit Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor for self and all <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> allies.

The Speed of this character and each <color=#fff568>ILLUMINATI</color> ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, Speed Bar cannot be filled or reduced by any character for themselves, allies, or enemies (this does not apply to Speed Bar gained through normal means).
